title: Draymond Green Wonâ€™t Be Suspended for Punching Jordan Poole
description: Green, the Golden State forward, punched guard Jordan Poole during a practice last week. The team decided that a fine, but no suspension, would be the best way to move forward.
dc:creator: Shauntel Lowe
media:credit: Santiago Mejia/San Francisco Chronicle, via Associated Press
media:description: Golden State forward Draymond Green apologized publicly Saturday for punching his teammate Jordan Poole. On Tuesday, the team said he would not be suspended.
